session_dir.description: Source session directory to archive (defaults to launcher session folder if omitted).
session_dir.title: Session Dir

network_dir.description: Destination directory on a network share.
network_dir.title: Network Dir

backup_dir.description: Optional local backup directory used as an intermediate or fallback.
backup_dir.title: Backup Dir

manifest_path.description: Optional path to a manifest file describing what was archived.
manifest_path.title: Manifest Path

include_patterns.description: Glob(s) of files to include (string or list).
include_patterns.title: Include Patterns

exclude_patterns.description: Glob(s) of files to exclude (string or list).
exclude_patterns.title: Exclude Patterns

dry_run.description: If true, do not write/copy; only log intended operations.
dry_run.title: Dry Run

skip_completed.description: If true, skip items that appear already archived.
skip_completed.title: Skip Completed

remove_empty_dirs.description: If true, remove empty source directories after archiving.
remove_empty_dirs.title: Remove Empty Dirs
